meta.description: Externalized BFolioDecoder maps with constraint citations
meta.v1.1_changes: Expert validation: fixed -ey (strong→selective), -dy (gentle→basic), -ar (recover→close), removed sch=grind (unsupported), demoted ksh/FL glosses to Tier 4, fixed CC_TOKENS to use C874 labels
meta.v1.2_changes: Fixed lch/te prefix_roles: PREP→PREP_TIER to separate role taxonomy from phase taxonomy
meta.v1.3_changes: Expert deep validation: ct CC_CORE→A_ENRICHED (C282), al/ar/or AX_LINK→AX_LATE (C539/C609), ly WATER demoted to Tier 4, OIL_MARKER kc/okch demoted to Tier 4 (F-BRU-020 is F4)
meta.v1.4_changes: Expert f26r glossing: -edy energy-check→thorough (C283), -dy basic→close (C597), -hy maintain→verify-maintain (C907)
meta.tier_note: tier 0-2 = structural (constraint-backed), tier 3 = interpretive (Brunschwig-grounded), tier 4 = speculative

al.note: LATE/CLOSE prefix (3.78x line-final per C539), not LINK operator

ol.note: LATE prefix; also creates LINK tokens (C609) and CC Class 11 (C788)

ct.note: CT is 0.14x B-enriched (A-enriched per C282), NOT CC_CORE. Rare in B, folio-specific (C284)

edy.note: 49x B-enriched (C283): marks complete/thorough execution, not energy-check

hy.note: C907: maintenance checkpoint formula (ch/sh + consonant MIDDLE + hy)

suffix_flow.note: Control-flow semantics for suffixes. Used by --flow rendering mode.

ly.note: No direct constraint maps -ly to WATER. C527 covers -y/-dy (herb) and -ey/-ol (animal) but not -ly specifically

kc.note: F-BRU-020 (Output Category Vocabulary Signatures) is F4 tier

okch.note: F-BRU-020 (Output Category Vocabulary Signatures) is F4 tier

fl_stage_map.tier_note: Stage names (INITIAL/EARLY/MEDIAL/LATE/TERMINAL) are Tier 2 per C777. Semantic glosses (raw material, reacting, etc.) are Tier 4.

prefix_actions.note: Operational verbs. PREP from F-BRU-012, WORK from C929/C556, Brunschwig mapping from C930/C931/BRUNSCHWIG_APPARATUS_MAPPING phase.

qo.note: Core distillation/execution. Rank 1 prefix, selects kernel MIDDLEs (k,t,ke) exclusively. Uniform positional distribution (always present). B-enriched 1.30x.

ok.note: DOMAIN SELECTOR: vessel/apparatus target (C936 revised). MIDDLE provides action on vessel. Late position (mean 0.538). H-enriched 1.36x. e-family + infra MIDDLEs (C911). Sister pair with ot (proactive/corrective). Jaccard 0.82 with ot.

ot.note: Post-process (rectify/filter/pour). Late position (init/final 0.36x). C-enriched 1.48x. Selects finalize MIDDLEs (al 4.6x, am 4.3x, ar 4.0x). Jaccard 0.82 with ok.

da.note: Setup/mix/replenish. Bimodal position (both setup and teardown). H-enriched 1.53x, T-enriched 2.02x. Selects continuation MIDDLEs (iin 10.4x, r 6.9x, m 11.1x). Jaccard 0.67 with sa.

ol.note: Store/continue. Final position (init/final 0.40x). B-enriched 1.47x. Selects kernel MIDDLEs (k dominant in all sections, sh 10.3x). Complements lk (section anti-correlated).

sa.note: Dry/macerate (pre-treatment). 43.8% line-initial (3.89x init/final). Selects continuation MIDDLEs (iin 10.6x, i 11.2x, in 13.6x). Jaccard 0.67 with da, 0.00 with ch/sh/ok/ot.

lk.note: Monitor drips / regulate fire. 81.7% section S (1.78x, C930). Selects checkpoint MIDDLEs (aiin 4.7x, ain 4.5x, ech 9.3x). Completely avoids k/t/ke. Fire-method specific.

ke.note: Cool/settle (thermal equilibration). Late position (init/final 0.29x). H-enriched 1.37x. Selects dy (7.3x), o (5.0x), eo (2.6x). Avoids k/l/t/iin/r.

pch.note: Gather/collect. 48.2% line-initial, 25.5x par-initial (highest procedure opener). Even section distribution (universal operation).

lch.note: Pour/strain (liquid transfer). Final position (init/final 0.40x). B-enriched 1.30x, H-depleted 0.24x. Selects edy (4.1x), ey (3.6x). Co-occurs with lk (1.39x).

te.note: Strip/wash (preparation). 19.7% line-initial (3.35x init/final). C-enriched 1.91x, H-enriched 1.40x. Selects dy (10.4x), o, d, ey.
